frame.name: Arraignment
frame.definition: <def-root>At a court hearing, a <fen>Defendant</fen> is informed of the <fen>Charges</fen> against him or her, (usually) enters a plea, and a decision is made by a <fen>Judge</fen> as to the amount of bail, if any.</def-root>

FE.name: Defendant
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Defendant</fen> is charged with a crime by a <fen>Judge</fen>. <ex> <fex name="Defendant">Jan</fex> was <t>arraigned</t> on eight counts of treason.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the arraignment occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the arraignment occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Judge</fen> is the head of the court where the arraignment occurs. <ex> Jan was <t>arraigned</t> on eight counts of treason <fex name="Judge">before Duncan Smith</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Charges
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Charges</fen> is the crime with which the <fen>Defendant</fen> is charged. <ex>Jan was <t>arraigned</t> <fex name="Charges">on eight counts of treason</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of time that the arraignment takes.
<ex>Just a <fex name="Dur">short</fex> little <t>arraignment</t>, and then you'll walk, alright?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the arraignment which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (openly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Judge</fen> that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully).
<ex>Everyone 's always <fex name="Manner">very carefully</fex> <t>arraigned</t> before they meet trial, don't you worry none.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: arraign.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: call before a court to answer a criminal charge

lexUnit.name: arraignment.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the calling of a defendant before a court to answer a criminal charge
